metadata.publisher: A Paris : Chez Boudet, imprimeur du roi, rue Saint-Jacques
metadata.description: Prospectus for Verdier and Fortier's "Cours d'éducation" and "Maison d'éducation physique et morale", the latter of which was never published
"Ce prospectus se distribue gratuitement à Paris chez MM. Verdier & Fortier, quai S. Bernard, la seconde porte cochere avant la rue de Seine"--P. 16
metadata.notes: Handwritten notes throughout - Some lost in binding. Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Title page and cover are combined.
